text: nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷē! Oru viṣami uṅkaḷiṭam oru ceytiyaik koṇṭuvantāl, (ataṉ uṇmaiyai aṟiyum poruṭṭu atait) tīrkka vicāraṇai ceytu koḷḷuṅkaḷ. (Illaiyeṉil, avaṉuṭaiya collai nampi) aṟiyāmaiyāl oru kūṭṭattiṟku nīṅkaḷ tīṅkiḻaittu viṭṭup piṉṉar, nīṅkaḷ ceytavaṟṟaip paṟṟi nīṅkaḷē tukkittuk kavalaippaṭumpaṭiyum nērntuviṭum
